creator: apache@martin-scheerer.de
text:
After unpacking the file INSTALL-BIN.txt contains as first step: 

1) Copy the war file into the webapps directory of your servlet container

but there is no war file. I've tried the nightly - the same problem.
I've tried too to get the war-file by using ant.
But this is the binary distribution so there is no src-folder. Ant doesn't work.

When you are new to Lenya and want to take a quick look on it, this problem
doesn't make you very happy ...

lenya comes with jetty. there is no need to have a second servlet container. if
you need, copy the contents of build/lenya/webapp to webapps/lenya
creator: gregor@apache.org
